text: Chinese Theater Club was born in the most beautiful time of the year.
Whether you are a first-time theater novice or an experienced theater veteran, you can come to the club to learn about acting.

General Meeting to get acquainted with everyone in CTC; Acting Workshops to continue to polish your acting skills; Light workshop to create a stage lighting wizard; Script Appreciation Workshop to teach you to read a good script; 'Go to the theater together' theater friends offline activities, occasional good theater recommendations.

March 11 was destined to be a sleepless night full of surprises. Six wonderful plays were competing in turn. One second we were amused and laughing, and the next second we were tugging at fragile heartstrings, and together with the hundreds of spectators in the audience, we witnessed the birth of the actors.
We are one year old! Whether it's a talent show, or you just like to see the show and have a good time, CTC welcomes you to come and have fun!
A scene seems to be short, but its mood last long. The ups and downs of thoughts are like turbulent waves. 3 hours of emotional outbursts, 5 shows a week, and 2 months of intense rehearsals.
